publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1024 Mr Jack McConnell: Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the following expenditure— (a) payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund, of sums required by the Scottish Ministers to pay remuneration and allowances to part-time sheriffs; and (b) charged on that Fund, of any increase attributable to the Act in expenditure charged on that Fund by any other Act.
